response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you to acquire this item. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 12000}
